shaps_01.Description: I would enjoy my favourite television or radio programme

shaps_02.Description: I would enjoy being with my family or close friends

shaps_03.Description: I would find pleasure in my hobbies and pastimes

shaps_04.Description: I would be able to enjoy my favourite meal

shaps_05.Description: I would enjoy a warm bath or refreshing shower

shaps_06.Description: I would find pleasure in the scent of flowers or the smell of a fresh sea breeze or freshly baked bread

shaps_07.Description: I would enjoy seeing other people`s smiling faces

shaps_08.Description: I would enjoy looking smart when I have made an effort with my appearance

shaps_09.Description: I would enjoy reading a book, magazine or newspaper

shaps_10.Description: I would enjoy a cup of tea or coffee or my favourite drink

shaps_11.Description: I would find pleasure in small things, e.g. bright sunny day, a telephone call from a friend

shaps_12.Description: I would be able to enjoy a beautiful landscape or view

shaps_13.Description: I would get pleasure from helping others

shaps_14.Description: I would feel pleasure when I receive praise from other people
